ResourceHeader.ResourceName: RENU2 PhotoMultiplier Tube (PMT) Auroral Red and Green Line Luminosity in Raylieghs, Background subtracted, High Time Resolution (H0), 4 ms Data
ResourceHeader.Description: RENU2 PMT Counts converted to Rayleighs and Background subtracted
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigators, M.R. Lessard and J.H. Hecht, from the University of New Hampshire and Aerospace Corporation, respectively, for providing the Data.

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time, Red Line
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time, Red Line, Terrestrial Time 2000, Interval Centered Time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression.

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time, Green Line
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time, Green Line, Terrestrial Time 2000, Interval Centered Time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression.

Parameter.Name: Auroral Red Line
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH

Parameter.Name: Auroral Green Line
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_GREEN
